phase1

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • phase1.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    implements a Deck object that has a color, an arrayList of the action Card, the current number of cards left and its maximum card per deck

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<ActionCard> actionCard 
      private int MAX 
      private int numCards 
      private java.lang.String type 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck(java.lang.String type, int max)
      generates a Deck given the type and the max number of cards in it

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void checkDeck()
      helper function that checks the deck whenever a player draws.
      ActionCard drawCard()
      draws a card from the deck which also decrements the current number of cards returns the action card drawn
      void generateDeck()
      generates a deck of action cards which has a composition of 40% (Collect from Bank) Cards, 40% (Pay Bank) Cards, 10% (Pay Player), and 10% (Collect from Player) of the total number (max) of cards specified.
      java.lang.String showCards()
      prints the number of cards in order (from bottom of the stack to its top) which is used for debugging the program specifically, when the user draws.
      void shuffleDeck()
      shuffles the deck generated

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • type

        private java.lang.String type

      • actionCard

        private java.util.ArrayList<ActionCard> actionCard

      • numCards

        private int numCards

      • MAX

        private final int MAX

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck(java.lang.String type,
            int max)
        generates a Deck given the type and the max number of cards in it
        Parameters:
        type - type of the card object which may either be salary, career, action, and blue
        max - max number of cards in a deck

    • Method Detail

      • generateDeck

        public void generateDeck()
        generates a deck of action cards which has a composition of 40% (Collect from Bank) Cards, 40% (Pay Bank) Cards, 10% (Pay Player), and 10% (Collect from Player) of the total number (max) of cards specified.

      • shuffleDeck

        public void shuffleDeck()
        shuffles the deck generated

      • showCards

        public java.lang.String showCards()
        prints the number of cards in order (from bottom of the stack to its top) which is used for debugging the program specifically, when the user draws. returns the appended/ concatenated list of cards
        Returns:
        String of appended description of the cards.

      • drawCard

        public ActionCard drawCard()
        draws a card from the deck which also decrements the current number of cards returns the action card drawn
        Returns:
        ActionCard

      • checkDeck

        private void checkDeck()
        helper function that checks the deck whenever a player draws. It calls the shuffleDeck() method when current number of cards is 0.
